Articles.Content:
Hello everyone I have currently the KSP 90 and Mechjeb 2420

Now, whenever I do ascent mode and it starts the maneuver node execution, the controls are going crazy and not move towards the blue thingy,

target or something, and it happens at rendvenzure too! How can I fix it it's very annoying?

And in docking mode I cant set as target the docking target I right click it alot of times and it doesn't do anything.

thanks.
You should post in the mechjeb thread IMO.

You should post in the mechjeb thread IMO.

Can you give me a link?

Can someone please help me? I don't understand why it's happening..

Whenever I enable/it auto-enables node execution for first second it seems like it works fine ,then the controls just go back and forth..
